data.title: Pula Croatia Travel Guide
data.meta_description: PulaCroatia.net – Pula Croatia Travel Guide. Find tourist information about apartments, hotels, hostels, resorts, villas, historical sites in Pula Croatia.
data.text:
Verudela villas Pula 20 detached villas for holiday rental in Croatia, harmoniously arranged among pine trees, provide an ideal Mediterranean setting for rest and relaxation.Accommodation in the modern Verudela Villas offers relaxation even in the peak season and transforms your holiday into a magical adventure. The vicinity of the Park Plaza Verudela holiday resort with its wide range of facilities, great choice of bars and restaurants and numerous shopping opportunities, as well as the sea and the lovely pebbly beach make this an idyllic destination on the Adriatic coast and a perfect choice for families with children. The entire villa resort in Pula is air-conditioned. Verudela villas Pula accommodation We all need to escape sometimes. To be pampered and spoiled in exclusive surroundings. That’s where Verudela Villas comes in – the most beautiful destination in Croatia will turn your holiday into a magical adventure. Apartment types at Verudela villas Pula: Accomodation units equipment and furnishing:

Splendid Golden Rocks Pula Resort The surrounding rocky coast is on a gentle incline to the sea, and many of the apartments at the Splendid Golden Rocks Istria afford spectacular views over the Adriatic Sea, as well as over Pula’s charming seafront promenade – Lungomare.The Splendid Golden Rocks resort is idyllically situated in the popular area generally known as ‘Podstinje’ or ‘Golden Rocks’ in Croatia. The Splendid Golden Rocks Croatia resort attracts families in particular, because of its child-friendly policies, and perfect seaside location. At the hilltop of the tourist complex is Fort Bourgignon,dates back to the Austro-Hungarian period, and is a magnificent example of architecture and history which guests find fascinating. Splendid Golden Rocks Pula Resort When it comes to selecting a holiday with a real Mediterranean flavour, Croatia resorts – particularly the beautiful resorts in Istria, cannot be beaten. One of the top resorts in Croatia is the Splendid Resort Apartments, popular Pula Resort Apartments, which overlook the Verudela Peninsula. Splendid Golden Rocks Pula Resort accommodation The excellent accommodation on offer at the Splendid Resort Apartments includes one and two bedrooms. Even the smallest one bedroom apartments can fit up to four persons, and […]

Hotel Park Plaza Histria Pula Only steps from the beach, Park Plaza Histria Pula is 4 km from Pula’s center. Featuring 3 restaurants, tennis and racquetball courts, it features an outdoor pool, pool tables, mini golf and lounge chairs. Providing panoramic views, the accommodations include a balcony, modern furnishings and an LCD satellite TV. Each unit is air-conditioned and has a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower. The wellness & spa area is 5,920 ft² and features an indoor swimming pool with sea water, Turkish bath, Finnish sauna, ice bath and relax zone with heated lounge chairs. There is also a fully equipped gym and an on-site hair and beauty salon. Hotel Park Plaza Histria Pula accommodation Hotel Park Plaza Histria Pula Park Plaza Histria has various restaurants serving traditional Istrian cuisine and international dishes. Guests can also enjoy the Adriatic Sea view from terraces of hotel’s cafés. Pula is known for its amphitheater, one of the 6 largest surviving Roman arenas in the world. Pula International Airport is 11.3 km from the Park Plaza Histria. Hotel Park Plaza Histria Pula facilities

Hotel Istra Fažana Featuring free WiFi, Hotel Istra offers accommodation in Fažana. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Private parking is available on site.Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have views of the sea or garden. All rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Extras include free toiletries and a hair dryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. This hotel has a private beach area and bike hire is available. You can engage in various activities, such as golfing and cycling. Hotel Istra Fažana accommodation Hotel Istra Fažana facilities

Hotel Villa Letan Fažana Situated near the sea, opposite to the National Park Brijuni, 12 km from Pula City Center and 15 km from Pula Airport, Villa Letan Hotel offers you all the comfort and advantages of a well-equipped hotel. Our four star rating is a guarantee of quality, in no way a limitation, because we make every effort to meet all your needs and wishes. Your holiday will be a more relaxing one with an outdoor pool, tennis court, bicycle rental, beauty centre with massage and aromatherapy services, Finnish sauna, Jacuzzi and a tanning parlour. Hotel Villa Letan Fažana accommodation Hotel Villa Letan Fažana facilities

Hotel Villetta Phasiana Fažana Beautifully situated in the heart of the old fishermen village Fazana and close to the Brioni Islands National Park, Villetta Phasiana has been refurbished with rustic yet luxurious Italian furnishings. The charming Villetta is located in a calm area and offers remarkably decorated accommodation with marble bathrooms and amazing sea views. Breakfast is served in the privacy of a secluded garden with an authentic stone well or on the terrace near the main Piazza, facing the charming port. For those who choose to eat indoors, breakfast is also served in the picturesque bar, La Barchetta. Hotel Villetta Phasiana Fažana accommodation Hotel Villetta Phasiana Fažana facilities

BiVillage Resort Pula Fažana Bi-Village, with its history and culture, will win you over and give you a dream vacation. The campsite is located in Fazana, charming town with Roman and Venetian influences, situated in front of the Brijuni Islands and its national park, just 7 km from the tourist center of Pula.This vacation center in Istria opened in 2000, and it was honored as the first level of campsite by the Croatian Ministry of Tourism and holds for years the Blue Flag award, the international program for the protection of coastal areas. BiVillage Resort Pula Fažana accommodation Villas, apartments, room beach, mobile homes or camping? 240 housing units, 170 mobilhomes and 1000 pitches! Whatever your idea of a vacation may be, you will find the perfect accommodation at Bi-Village. Choose accommodation for your stay in our tourist resort in Fazana and discover advantages and peculiarities of each type of accommodation. For a safe and personalized choice to meet every need and wallet. Accommodation types at BiVillage Resort Pula Fažana: BiVillage Resort Pula Fažana facilities Discover our tourist resort in Fazana to experience a vacation made-to-measure for you! At Bi-Village you will find many advantages, including: […]

Ribarska koliba Resort Pula Apartments Ribarska Koliba is set in Verudela, 3 km from Pula city centre. The property features free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned studios and apartments. An à la carte restaurant with a terrace overlooking the Adriatic Sea is suitable for al fresco dining. The property features an outdoor swimming pool. Sakordjana Beach is 400 metres from the Ribarska Koliba, while Ambrela Beach can be reached within 600 metres. A boat that takes tourists to Fratarski Island with pebbly beaches is only 200 metres from the property. Ribarska koliba Resort Pula Apartments All apartments and studios are decorated with modern furniture and are fitted with satellite TV and a fully equipped kitchenette. Most of them come with one or more furnished balconies and patios. Verudela Sport Centre offers tennis courts, scooter rental, diving and paragliding equipment and can be found 400 metres away. Pula Roman Amphitheatre is 3 km from Ribarska Koliba. Apartment types at Ribarska Koliba Pula:

Verudela Beach Resort Pula The idyllic peace and tranquility of Verudela Beach, harmoniously set amidst pine trees and medicinal Mediterranean plants, transforms your holidays into a delightful experience surrounded by nature. Most Croatia holiday rentals offer a splendid and soothing view of the sea and are located at Punta Verudela resort just a few steps from Mediterranean vegetation and a seafront promenade. These holiday apartments in Croatia are the perfect Adriatic destination for families with children and all guests who want to enjoy the sun, sea, entertainment and the various facilities of the Park Plaza Verudela holiday resort. Verudela Beach Resort Pula accommodation Look out over the crystal clear sea and beautiful beaches, or alternatively the lush green of the surrounding Mediterranean parkland from the balcony of the spacious apartments. Verudela Beach Resort Pula accommodation facilities Apartment types at Verudela Beach Resort Pula: Accomodation units equipment and furnishing:

Horizont Golden Rocks Pula Resort The Horizont Golden Rocks resort Croatia enjoys an idyllic situation, set amidst lush green Mediterranean vegitation, on the beautiful Adriatic coastline.The Horizont Golden Rocks Resort is the perfect place for a family holiday. The self catering apartments make the ideal choice for guests traveling with children – since they provide comfortable, spacious accommodation and the option to come and go as you please. Guests enjoy great views over the nearby peninsula,and the relax on the gently sloping pristine beaches, as well as swim in the crystal clear water. Horizont Golden Rocks Pula Resort The Horizont Golden Rocks Resort is also packed with scenic paths and trails – along with a seaside promenade – just perfect for an evening stroll. The scent of pine trees, and fine natural attractions will be some of the memories to take home from a Croatia holiday in the resort. One of the main attractions of staying in the Horizont Golden Rocks Resort apartments is the beautiful sea views – since all the units have their own balconies. The apartments are spacious, too – with the largest having a floor space of around 47 meters square and capable […]

Park Plaza Verudela Pula Resort The Park Plaza Verudela Resort offers an enchanting combination of supreme comfort and hospitality making you feel completely at home. The Park Plaza Verudela Resort (previously known as Punta Verudela Resort) features comfortable self-catering apartment accommodation, on the beautiful southern coast of Croatia. Located on the eastern side of the Punta Verudela peninsula, the Park Plaza Verudela Resort (previously known as Punta Verudela Resort) offers modern and well equipped accommodation and makes an ideal choice of stay for families with children, as well as travellers who enjoy the flexibility of a residential apartment during their stay. Park Plaza Verudela Pula Resort accommodation This Mediterranean style resort consists of 385 self catering apartments which are the perfect choice for families with children, as well as travelers who enjoy the flexibility of a residential apartment during their stay. Apartment types at Park Plaza Verudela Pula Resort: Park Plaza Verudela Pula Resort apartments facilities All apartment types at Park Plaza Verudela feature the following amenities:

Hotel Veli Jože Pula The Hotel Veli Jože is located in the historic 3000 year old city of Pula, near the beautiful beaches and seafront promenade. Thehotel is open all year round and offers a bed and breakfast. The hotel building itself is a cultural monument from the 19th century and the former headquarters of the Austro-Hungarian navy. The immediate vicinity of the city makes it an ideal accommodation facility for those who want to be in the center of city events and without the use of public transport visit the numerous attractions and rich history of the town of Pula. The hotel is particularly interesting and to the the guests who come on business trip in Pula. Hotel Veli Jože Pula accommodation Hotel Veli Joze has a total of 80 units with a capacity of 168 beds (73 rooms and 7 suites) distributed in two wings on three floors. Hotel Veli Jože room facilities Unit suite consists of a bedroom (double room) and the air-conditioned living room with a TV, minibar and telephone. Living area is equipped with a chair set consisting of two armchairs, a sofa and club chairs. Unit suite has two separate bathrooms. Common areas […]

Butique Hotel Oasi near Pula Our modern equiped boutique hotel and restaurant offers an absolutely intimate vacation to all those who want to escape the hasty and noisy lifestyle. It is situated in in Pjescana uvala – Pula, just a few minutes walk from beautiful sea. A pleasant ambience, wellness zone, a rich gastronomic offer of the restaurant within hotel make the Oasi an ideal place for all those who seek distance from summer heats and simply want complete relaxation. Butique Hotel Oasi accomodation Butique Hotel Oasi near Pula Located in Pješčana Uvala, a peaceful bay just a few kilometres from the busy town of Pula, Boutique Hotel Oasi is surrounded by lush Mediterranean greenery. Featuring an outdoor pool and a wellness area, it also offers an on-site bar and restaurant. Free Wi-Fi and parking are provided. This eco-friendly hotel uses solar energy for warming water and heating indoor spaces during the colder periods of the year. Floor heating is featured in all rooms, which have Italian parquets. Room facilities

Hotel Brioni Pula The Hotel Brioni Pula is one of the most highly regarded hotels in Croatia, enjoying a superb location overlooking the indented Istrian Peninsula and charming seafront promenade.Guests also benefit from being surrounded by the lush Mediterranean greenery which is typical of this beautiful stretch of Adriatic coast. The Hotel Brioni Pula is connected to the sea via a series of terraced beaches. The hotel makes the ideal choice of resort for both a vacation and business trip, with a stunning backdrop which is perfect for a variety of business events or meetings. Hotel Brioni Pula accommodation Hotel rooms type: Hotel Brioni Pula Located 200 metres from a beautiful pebbly beach, Hotel Brioni also features an indoor and outdoor pool and an a-la-carte restaurant. The centre of Pula and the famous amphitheatre can be reached in 4 km. Free WiFi is available and parking is provided. The hotel is surrounded by a pine tree forest and features easy access to various pebbly and rocky beaches. The hotel is located just a short walk from Pula Aquarium, 1.4 km from Lungomare and 3.0 km from Archaeological Museum in Pula. Pula Airport is 10 km away. Hotel […]

Hotel Park Plaza Arena Pula The Hotel Park Plaza Arena Pula enjoys a superb location, set amidst lush Mediterranean greenery, on the Adriatic coast within the Park Plaza Verudela resort. The hotel is right by a beautiful beach and natural deep sea cove – perfect for exploring, as well as a number of scenic bike and walking trails. The Park Plaza Arena Pula offers the guests the convenience of knowing everything is catered for during their stay. This is an especially popular option for busy families, keen to enjoy their vacation to the maximum and who also enjoy the wide range of modern amenities on offer. Hotel Park Plaza Arena Pula accommodation Hotel rooms type: Hotel Park Plaza Arena Pula Renovated in May 2015, Park Plaza Arena Pula is surrounded by a fragrant pine forest just 50 metres from the Adriatic coast. A health and wellness centre is complemented by 2 sea water swimming pools with sun deck offering sea views. Hotel rooms equipment and furnishing:

Hotel Milan Pula Like an oasis of this part of Istria and Croatia, qualities which are told by our many guests, like they are in one of european metropolises, in Milan we have shaped a place in which we also love to enjoy – cosy, proffessional, discrete, and with great attention to details.All that sorrounds our restaurant, hotel and enoteque suggests the desire that we want to create urban space in which will guest recognise that he comes first. Restaurant and hotel Milan is being run exclusively by our family, for 3 generations now. The philosophy itself has been changed only slightly – like that in everyone of us is interwowen same system of values in which we belive for 3 generations now. Hotel Milan Pula accomodation Hotel Milan in Pula offers these types of room: Hotel Milan Pula Those values are attached to our belief in providing the best of Istrian territory in every Milan dish, relaxed sleep in hotel accommodation of the town which history begins in ancient times, and bussiness privacy in the facilities we treat as ‘clubs’. To our guests we want to give the best of experiences, both culinary and catering, which […]

Hotel Scaletta Pula In the very centre of the town, nearby the Roman amphitheatre, surrounded by Austro-Hungarian architecture, you are welcomed by the Scaletta Hotel. This hotel will capture you with its grace, its pleasant milieu and cosiness will do all to make you relax and rest in the best possible way. Besides a 12 supremely equipped rooms, there is a restaurant at your service. The cuisine has already won some prices for its international gastronomic specialities. The vicinity of the centre of the town gives the opportunity to sightseeing in this 3000 years old city. Choosing Scaletta for your stay in Pula, you will be able to visit the monuments like the Temple of Augustus and the Forum of Pula, the Castle and the Roman Theatre etc. Hotel Scaletta Pula accommodation Scaletta offers modern, comfortable, fully equipped rooms. Each of its 2 single and 10 double rooms have: Hotel Scaletta Pula There are the bus and the railway stations in the vicinity, and also the Pula Marina, especially lively in the summer months. That is the starting point of numerous organised and free lines which will take you by sea along the west Istrian coast or […]

Hotel Pula in Pula Hotel “Pula” *** is located in Pula, Croatia and has recently been extensively renovated . Hotel is open whole year and has 172 double rooms and 8 suites. Our hotel is centrally located to make everyone’s stay enjoyable. Hotel Pula is meters away from beautiful green forest leading to a spectacular pebble beach. We offer double bed rooms, single beds or two-room apartments, with or without individual balconies and with or without a sea side. Our hotel has recently had extensive renovation and now has 3 stars. We are constantly improving our services to offer our guests the best comfort available. All of our rooms feature in room televisions, air-conditioning, safe, totally new furnishings and décor. Hotel Pula accomodation Completely renovated, equipped with modern equipment, TV sets, telephones and air conditioners in rooms and apartments, and offering 180 rooms altogether, Hotel Pula provides its guests with high-quality accommodation service and an ever-friendly staff. Hotel Pula restaurant Through gastronomic offer of the self-service and “a la carte” restaurant in the Hotel Pula one can enjoy the tastes and flavors of the Mediterranean, the richness from the see and land. Contact with fully confidence regarding […]

Hotel Galija Pula Galija, a small family hotel located on the south of the Istrian peninsula in centre of the 3000 year old town of Pula. Modernly equipped, it offers a pleasant stay to its guests all year round. Hotel Galija is oriented towards tourists, travellers and business people. It offers the possibility of organizing small business banquets and business seminars. Our restaurant is the source of Istrian, Mediterranean and international cuisine that binds tradition and proficiency of our chefs. We offer homemade pizzas from a wood-fired oven. Hotel Galija Pula is located in the town centre in the vicinity of ancient monuments that belong to the rich heritage of Pula. Hotel Galija Pula In the vicinity of the hotel there are many banks, main post office, which are at service to our business clients. For the guests of the hotel we offer 10% discount in our hair and cosmetic salon L”art & Co and fashion boutique. Hotel Galija Pula accommodation & facilities Hotel Galija projects the ambience of a family atmosphere that enables our guests to feel comfortable. Our team is service orientated with the purpose of satisfying our clients. Hotel rooms are completely equipped with: As a part […]

Hotel Aurora Pula The hotel is situated outside the city, among the green of the fields, in a quiet zone, far away from the noise of cars. It is situated 400 m from the first populated zone. The centre of the city of Pula is distant 4 km, while the beaches are distant 4,5 km. From the hotel there is a wiev on the city of Pula, a great part of the Istrian peninsula and surrounding islands. Pula city centre with Roman Amphitheatre is 5 km away. Beaches can be reached within 7 km. Water sports facilities such as jet skis and sailboats can be rented on the beach. Guests can also enjoy horseback riding or beach volleyball. Hotel Aurora Pula accommodation Capacity of the hotel: *The apartments (suite/s) are all equipped with cable TV, phone, air-condition, refrigerator *All the rooms and apartments have a balcony, a bathroom with shower, cable TV. It is allowed to keep pets*** Hotel Aurora Pula servies & facilities Hotel offer:

Hotel Amfiteatar Pula The Hotel Amfiteatar Pula is a chic and stylish 3 star hotel offering 18 spacious and relaxing rooms just a few moments walk from Pula Amphitheatre. Decorated in lime green and beige colours the rooms have a modern designer feel that seems to scream style. Located in the heart of ancient Pula, the Hotel Amfiteatar is just 2 mins from the Amphitheatre but also 5 minutes by foot from Pula Cathedral and a short walk from the ferry port. The beach and airport are also just 10 minutes away by car. Hotel Amfiteatar Pula In addition to breakfast being offered to guests as part of the room price, the Hotel Amfiteatar also enjoys a chic restaurant that offers creative cuisine and fine international wines. Hotel Amfiteatar Pula accommodation The Hotel Amfiteatar Pula is a stylish 3 star hotel offering 18 quality rooms in the heart of Pula within a few minutes walk from the Amphitheatre, the Museum of Contemporary Art, the Cathedral and the Harbour. Our refurbished rooms are available in both superior and classic standards and are decorated in bright lime green and beige colours. Chic and modern, our comfortable rooms are also available with […]

Hotel Omir Pula Centrally located in Pula just steps away from its most famous sights, Hotel Omir offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and cable TV. The 1st-century Roman amphitheatre Arena can be reached in a 5-minute walk. Each room has wooden furnishings and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. The Arch of Sergeii and the Temple of Roma and Augustus are just a few minutes’ walk away. A pebbly beach can be found 2 km from the property. Main train and bus stations are about a 15-minute walk away, while Pula Airport is 6 km from Hotel Omir. Hotel Omir Pula accommodation Hotel Omir Pula facilities Bathroom Bedroom Living Area Media & Technology Internet Parking Services

The Pula Amphitheater “Arena” One of the city with the Amphitheater was COLONIA JULIA POLA POLLENTIA. In ancient time, Pula also had two more theaters. The smaller one was inside the city walls, and the bigger was outside. The larger could receive almost entire population of the city (around 4000-5000 people), but the events were very attractive to the people in the surrounding villages. Smaller theater was on the slopes of Kaštel hill, not far away from the walls. The construction, as the entire urban structure, was adapted to the terrain configuration. The Pula Amphitheater “Arena” and two Theaters The most important evidence of Roman presence in Pula is the Pula Amphitheater, the Arena as it is called by the locals, which is the best preserved monument from ancient times in Croatia. Around 62 meters of well-preserved harmonious building is still visible today, with its scene building, half-round orchestra and half-round seats on the stairs, which were partially cut into the hill. There were three monumental entrances into the building, and many of the stairs were marked with the names of their leaseholders. The shows were performed during the state celebrations in September (“ludi romani”) and November (“ludi plebei”). Bigger […]

The Arch of the Sergii Pula One of the most valued monuments of classic Roman art is also one of the most beautiful ancient monuments in Pula. The Arch of the Sergii is one of the few private monuments, which was erected by Salvia Postuma from the Sergii family in honor of the three male members of her family. In any case, Salvia Postuma from the Sergii family (she was actually married into that family), had the monument built with her own funds. Her name is mention in two places. Between the left and central inscription, there is her name: SALVIA POSTUMA SERGI, which is Salvia Postuma, the wife of Sergi. The Arch of the Sergii Pula The other is above the arch on the central place: SALVIA POSTUMA SERGI DE SUA PECUNIA, which means Salvia Postuma, wife of Sergi, with her own money (did). It was very important for her to emphasize that the monument was built with her funds. Simple arch opening is decorated from the western city side, with elements typical for late Hellenic artistic style, which was very popular during the time of late Republic, and the ruling of Augustus. The relief shows allegoric […]

The Temple of Augustus in Pula The building in the center of attention of any person in the main city square is the Temple of Augustus, which is completely preserved sacral monument. The temple was dedicated to Roma and Emperor Augustus, and is most probably built in the 1st decade of the 1st century AD. During the Middle Ages, the temple had secular purpose. It was used for grain storage, and supposedly it was also the home to the Christian church for a short amount of time. On the wall of the temple, from the inside and the outside, there are many visible damages, which were cause by putting in the new windows, reordering the building into three floors, and fire which in several occasions ruined the roof construction. During World War II, the temple was directly hit with and airplane bomb, which dispersed among the pillars, and almost ruined it to the ground. Italian archaeologists have rebuilt and reconstructed it during the two-year military ruling of the city (1945-1947). The structure is built in the shape of a simple parallelogram with front porch which is built on four pillars. Four smooth pillars of the front portico, and one on […]

Puntižela Beach Štinjan Puntižela Beach is located within Puntižela resort which is near Štinjan. Punitžela resort has a camp, hostel, mobile houses and other facilities. Puntižela Beach is pebble and rocky with soft entrance to the sea and is suitable for families with kids, older and younger persons. Near the beach there are beach bars, restaurants, showers and dressing cabins. Lifeguard service takes care of the security of the swimmers. For lots of sports and fun activities you can rent boats and pedal boats, or play beach volleyball. There is a massage center on the beach. Puntižela Beach Štinjan

Histria Beach Pula Histria Beach is located under the Hotel Park Plaza Histria on Verudela Peninsula in Pula. The beach is very popular and is partially made of stone while the other part is built from concrete. Because of the soft entrance and a terrace all the way to the sea, Histria Beach is very suitable for families with kids and older persons. By the beach, there is a small autochthonous holm oak woods suitable for leisure in the shades. The beach was awarded with a Blue Flag as an evidence of crystal clear sea and maintenance of the beach. Lifeguard service takes care of the security, and there is a safety barrier to protect the swimmers. You can rent sunbeds and parasols on the beach along with other equipment. There is a Beach Bar & Restaurant Yacht on the beach. Histria Beach Pula

Lighthouse Beach Pula Lighthouse Beach is located near Cape Verudica on Verudela Peninsula in Pula. It is rocky. The beach a soft entrance to the sea and is suitable for younger population and families with kids. Because of the high cliffs on the western side, it is very popular among younger population, because they can jump into the sea. Small cliff in the sea, which is called Apple because of its shape, it the main attraction of the beach. Above the beach there is a terrace with a Restaurant and Pizzeria Svjetionik. The beach was named after Verudica Lighthouse which is located 20 meter from the beach. It was built in 1877, and there is a legend about it that the Roman Emperor Vespasian was in debt to the workers who built the Amphitheater (Arena), so to avoid their curse he buried the gold under the lighthouse. Lighthouse Beach Pula

Hawaiian Cove Beach Pula Hawaiian Cove Beach is located in Principina Cove at Verudela Peninsula in Pula. Central part of the beach is pebble with rocky boulders. Sides are rocky and medium height, suitable for water jumps. Entrance is very soft, suitable for families with kids. Hawaii Beach is one of the most popular beaches in Pula, especially among younger population. Name Hawaii was given to it probably because of the high waves during Jugo in the cove, which reminds of Hawaii. Hawaiian Cove Beach Pula

Hotel Brioni Beach Pula Hotel Brioni Beach is located between St John Cove and Cape St John, underneath the Hotel Brioni. The beach is rocky with concrete parts. It is suitable for families with kid and people of all ages. Hotel Brioni Beach has been awarded with a Blue Flag because of crystal clear sea and its maintenance. Outer showers, dressing cabins, restaurant, bar and outer pool of Hotel Brioni are all part of the beach. You can rend pedal boats and go parasailing. Lifeguard service takes care of the security, along with safe barrier. Sacred Rock and Canyon are within 100 meters of the beach. Hotel Brioni Beach Pula

Ambrela Beach Pula Ambrela Beach is located in small St John Cove, between Saccorgiana Beach and Hotel Brioni. It is covered in pebbles with boulders of rocks. On the side it is surrounded with autochthonous holm oak trees. Ambrela Beach is very popular among local population and guests. Because of soft entrance to the sea it is convenient for families with kids. In the vicinity of the beach there is a restaurant and a Lounge Bar Ambrela after which the beach was named. You can rent sunbeds, parasols and pedal boats on the beach. In the cove there is a safe net, and Lifeguard service also takes care of security. There are public showers, toilet and dressing rooms on the beach as well. Entrance is free along with free parking near the beach. Ambrela Beach has been awarded with a Blue Flag. Ambrela Beach Pula

Štinjan Beach Štinjan Beach – Štinjan Cove is located 700 meters from the center of Štinjan, and is characterized by the natural beauty, clean sea, thick pine woods and fascinating sunsets. Main beach is because of its soft entrance to the sea ideal for family vacation, and pets are also allowed on the beach. In Štinjan Cove there are many facilities for a fun and active vacation such as beach volleyball court, jet ski, aqua park and parasailing. For fun lovers, there are many beach bars along the coast that are open until morning hours. Besides the main beach, swimming is allowed in other coves as well. Štinjan Beach

Bi Val Beach Fažana Bi Val Beach is located inside the Bi Village Camp and Resort near Fažana and Valbandon. Length of the beach is 1 km, and 250 meters of the beach are marked with a Blue Flag because of the clean sea and maintained beach. Bi Val is a pebble beach with soft entrance to the sea, so it’s recommended for families with kid, older and disabled persons. You can rent sunbeds and parasols on the beach. Near the beach there are many bars and restaurants. The place for swimming is marked with a safe net and there is also Lifeguard service on the beach. Inside the beach there are dressing cabins and outdoor shower. Bi Val Beach Fažana

Valbandon Beach Valbandon has a beautiful pebble beach with soft entrance to sea which makes it suitable for families with kids and older persons. Parts of the beach are concrete. Near the beach there are many beach bars, restaurants, sports fields and sport harbor. The boardwalk is great for sports activities and walks, and it stretches from TN Puntižela in the south to TB BiVillage and Fažana in the north. Near the beach there is Ministry of Internal Affairs resort. Valbandon Beach

Sandy Cove – Pješčana Uvala Beach Pješčana Uvala Beach is one of the few sand beaches in Pula area. The coast of the cove is rocky, but its central part is a sand beach with soft entrance to the sea which makes its suitable for families with kids and young swimmers. You can rent sunbeds and parasols on the beach which has a water playground for the kids as well. Near the beach there are two beach bars and a few restaurants. Lifeguard service takes care of the security. There is a safety barrier on the end of the beach. Sandy Cove – Pješčana Uvala Beach

Saccorgiana Beach Pula Saccorgiana Beach is located in the cove of the same name, which is part of larger, Brankoras Bay. It is settled between Golden Rocks and St John Cove, known as Ambrela. Saccorgiana Beach is popular among local population. It is a pebble beach, in the central part of the cove with shallow entrance which makes it convenient for families with kids and older persons. The coast is rocky from the side and pets and dogs are allowed on the beach. Saccorgiana Beach has the following facilities: Beach Bar Zeppelin, massages, sunbeds for rent, water playground for kids and mini-football field. There is a peer from Austrian-Hungarian time on the beach with additional buildings. There is also free parking near the beach. Mediterranean monk seal Adriana often visits the beach in the winter and spring and she always brings joy to the local population. Saccorgiana Beach Pula

Valsaline-Mornar Beach Pula Valsaline-Mornar Beach is located in Saline Cove and marks an ending for well-known Pula boardwalk Lungomare. The beach is concrete and suitable for families with kids, older persons and young adults. Object “Mornar”, which is used for many sports activities such as: fitness, aerobics and other sports, is a part of the beach. During the summer, there are water-polo and swimming practices on the beach.There is a Youth Hostel Pula in Saline Cove, which has a beautiful pebble beach, opened for the public. Valsaline-Mornar Beach has its own free parking space. Valsaline-Mornar Beach Pula

Gortan Cove Beach Pula Gortan Cove Beach is located in the cove of the same name. It is part of the well-known Pula boardwalk Lungomare. Surrounding area is rocky with the shades from the pine trees, while its central part is pebble. The beach is filled with stair-like plateaus and it has a very shallow entrance to the sea, which makes it perfect for families with kids and older persons. Gortan Cove Beach is very small, so it can be crowded during the summer. Above the beach is a monument to Vladimir Gortan, a hero, and a beach bar Pomidor where you can get refreshments. You can arrive to the beach by car since there are many free parking spaces. There is a safe net in the cove which increases security for the bathers. Many young people come to the beach in the summer evenings. In the vicinity there is Hotel Pula and a recreational path. Gortan Cove Beach Pula

Lungomare Pula Lungomare is a well-known boardwalk in Pula located between Beach Valkane and Soline Cove. It is 4 km long, and is settled inside the thick pine woods. There are three beaches connected to the boardwalk: Valkane, Gortan Cove and Valsaline (Mornar). Near the boardwalk there is a recreational path with exercise devices. There are free parking spaces along the whole length of the boardwalk. During the day, Lungomare is filled with walkers and recreation lovers, and in the evening it becomes filled with young people. We recommend the walk around the magnificent sunset before evening hours. Lungomare Pula

Valkane beach Pula Valkane is the most notable and most furnished beach in Pula. It is located in Zelenika Cove in the western part of the town, in the beginning of Lungomare Boardwalk. Part of the beach is rocky and pebble and most part is made of concrete. One part is adapted to disabled persons with special ramps for entering the sea. There are two bars on the beach: Valkane bar and Šumi more, where you can enjoy in drinks next to the sea. At Valkane there is a playground for bocce and beach volleyball. Near the Sports Center Valkane there are several tennis courts, football field and Valter restaurant. Beach Valkane is awarded with a Blue Flag which is given to beaches with lots of facilities and crystal clear sea. There is a lifeguard service on the beach which takes care of security of the swimmers. Near the beach there is a bus stop with direct link to the city. Valkane beach Pula

Stoja beach Pula Stoja beach is a city beach which is located on the eastern side of Stoja Peninsula, inside Camp Stoja. It has a toilet, parking and lifeguards which take care of the security. Nearby there is a restaurant. The beach was built on 19th July 1936, and the architect was Enrico Trolis. Even though today it’s unfurnished and badly damaged, it is still suitable for people of all ages, as well as families with kids. In Stoja Peninsula area there is a stone fort from Austrian times that was part of the Pula’s defense system. Stoja beach Pula

Valovine beach Pula Valovine beach is located in the cove of the same name on the western side of Stoja Peninsula and Cape Valovine. Near the beach is one of the oldest Austrian forts (Ovina) which was formerly part of Pula’s defense system. Valovine used to be a camp which is no longer operational. The beach is rocky and pebble with one part covered in sand. Entrance is very shallow and suitable for families with kids and older persons. Camp Stoja is located nearby. There you can rent requisites for the beach and sport activities. At the central part there is a beach bar where you can enjoy in the beautiful sunset followed by a light breeze. Valovine beach Pula

Seagull’s Rocks beach – “Galebove stijene” Pula Seagull’s Rocks is located in Stoja, one of Pula’s neighborhoods, and is the most western beach in the city. The name was adopted because of many seagulls in that location. The beach is rocky with high cliffs which are suitable for jumping in the water. Entrance is more suitable for younger rather than the older people. Seagull’s Rocks border with former military base Muzil, and metal fence is keeping the visitors away from the facility. The beach is also known for several caves which you can explore, diveand take a submarine photo-shoot. Pets are allowed on the beach. Seagull’s Rocks beach – “Galebove stijene” Pula EXTRA TIP: Discover the beauty of the Adriatic sea & Croatian Islands by Small Ship Cruise Croatia.
